00001 #include "OpenGl.h"
00002 
00003 void OpenGl::Prepare(Model* model, std::string vertShader, std::string fragShader)
00004 {
00005         model->GetShader()->Initialize(vertShader, fragShader);
00006 
00007         int meshBatchSize = model->GetMeshBatch().size();
00008         for (int i = 0; i < meshBatchSize; i++)
00009         {
00010                 glGenVertexArrays(1, &model->GetMeshBatch()[i].VAO);
00011                 glGenBuffers(1, &model->GetMeshBatch()[i].VBO);
00012                 glGenBuffers(1, &model->GetMeshBatch()[i].EBO);
00013 
00014                 glBindVertexArray(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].VAO);
00015                 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].VBO);
00016 
00017                 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0]) * model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices().size(), &model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0], GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00018 
00019                 glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].EBO);
00020                 glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetIndices().size() * sizeof(unsigned int), &model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetIndices()[0], GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00021 
00022                 // vertex positions
00023                 glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0]), 0);
00024                 // vertex texture coords
00025                 glVertexAttribPointer(1, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0]), (GLvoid*)sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0].m_position));
00026                 // vertex normals
00027                 glVertexAttribPointer(2, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0]), (GLvoid*)sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0].m_texCoords));
00028                 // vertex colours
00029                 glVertexAttribPointer(3, 4, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0]), (GLvoid*)sizeof(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices()[0].m_normal));
00030 
00031                 glBindVertexArray(0);
00032         }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void OpenGl::Render(Model* model)
00036 {
00037         model->GetShader()->TurnOn();
00038 
00039         int meshBatchSize = model->GetMeshBatch().size();
00040         for (int i = 0; i < meshBatchSize; i++)
00041         {
00042                 unsigned int diffuseNr = 1;
00043                 unsigned int specularNr = 1;
00044                 unsigned int normalNr = 1;
00045                 unsigned int heightNr = 1;
00046 
00047                 int textureListSize = meshBatchSize;
00048                 for (int j = 0; j < textureListSize; j++)
00049                 {
00050                         glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0 + j); // activate proper texture unit before binding
00051                                                                                                 // retrieve texture number (the N in diffuse_textureN)
00052                         std::string number;
00053                         std::string name = model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetTextures()[0].m_type;
00054 
00055                         if (name == "texture_diffuse")
00056                                 number = std::to_string(diffuseNr++);
00057                         else if (name == "texture_specular")
00058                                 number = std::to_string(specularNr++);
00059                         else if (name == "texture_normal")
00060                                 number = std::to_string(normalNr++);
00061                         else if (name == "texture_height")
00062                                 number = std::to_string(heightNr++);
00063                         else
00064                                 std::cout << "Incorrect texture Id in OpenGl renderer" << std::endl;
00065 
00066                         GLuint textureUniformId = model->GetShader()->GetVariable((name + number).c_str());
00067                         model->GetShader()->SetFloat(textureUniformId, j);
00068                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetTextures()[0].m_id);
00069 
00070                         if (meshBatchSize == 1)
00071                                 break;
00072                 }
00073                 glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
00074 
00075                 glm::mat4 projectionMatrix = model->GetCamera()->GetProjectionMatrix();
00076                 glm::mat4 modelMatrix = CreateTransformationMatrix(model->GetPosition(), model->GetRotation(), model->GetScale());
00077                 glm::mat4 viewMatrix = CreateViewMatrix(model->GetCamera());
00078 
00079                 GLint modelMatrixId = model->GetShader()->GetVariable("model");
00080                 GLint viewMatrixId = model->GetShader()->GetVariable("view");
00081                 GLint projectionMatrixId = model->GetShader()->GetVariable("projection");
00082 
00083                 model->GetShader()->SetMatrix4(modelMatrixId, 1, false, &modelMatrix[0][0]);
00084                 model->GetShader()->SetMatrix4(viewMatrixId, 1, false, &viewMatrix[0][0]);
00085                 model->GetShader()->SetMatrix4(projectionMatrixId, 1, false, &projectionMatrix[0][0]);
00086 
00087                 glBindVertexArray(model->GetMeshBatch()[i].VAO);
00088 
00089                 glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
00090                 glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
00091                 glEnableVertexAttribArray(2);
00092                 glEnableVertexAttribArray(3);
00093 
00094                 glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetVertices().size());
00095                 //glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, model->GetMeshBatch()[i].GetIndices().size(), GL_UNSIGNED_INT, 0);
00096 
00097                 glDisableVertexAttribArray(0);
00098                 glDisableVertexAttribArray(1);
00099                 glDisableVertexAttribArray(2);
00100                 glDisableVertexAttribArray(3);
00101 
00102                 glBindVertexArray(0);
00103 
00104         }
00105         model->GetShader()->TurnOff();
00106 }
